text: Neostenanthera is a genus of flowering plant in the Annonaceae family. All discovered species are native to continental Africa. It contains the following species, according to The Plant List: * Neostenanthera gabonensis (Engl. & Diels) Exell * Neostenanthera hamata (Benth.) Exell * Neostenanthera myristicifolia (Oliv.) Exell * Neostenanthera neurosericea (Diels) Exell * Neostenanthera robsonii Le Thomas ==References== Category:Annonaceae Category:Annonaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Neostenanthera
